name: WinRM Access with Evil-WinRM
description: Adversaries may use Valid Accounts to log into a computer using the Remote Desktop Protocol (RDP). The adversary may then perform actions as the logged-on user.
query: (process.executable:/.*\\[Rr][Uu][Bb][Yy]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Ii]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Uu]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\-[Pp]\ .*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.executable:*\\ruby.exe AND process.command_line:*\-i\ * AND process.command_line:*\-u\ * AND process.command_line:*\-p\ *)`
